name: FConveyorSpaceData
comment: Copyright 2017 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

properties.name: AvailableSpace
properties.comment: The last cached available space on the belt

properties.name: HasNewItem
properties.comment: if the conveyor has a new item on it.

methods.name: FillDistributionTable
methods.comment:
Populate the elements of the distribution table. The algorithm vaires between normal splitters and smart splitters.
The goal is to get all possible items assigned to an output while maintaining throughput and evenly splitting items between belts

methods.name: EstimatedMaxNumGrabFromConveyor
methods.comment: Returns an estimate of how many items the conveyor connected to the given component can grab. If no conveyor is connected it returns 0

properties.name: mCurrentOutputIndex
properties.comment: Cycles through the outputs, stores the output we want to put mItem on. Index is for the mOutputs array.

properties.name: mDistributionTable
properties.comment: Table of all items in the inventory mapped to a desired output. The array is filled from a call to FillDistributionTable which runs in factory tick

properties.name: mConveyorSpaceData
properties.comment: Store last cached available space and if an item have been grabbed by the connected components
